name: Music Near Me
description: A blog that lists concerts in your local area, with a brief blurb about the performer(s).

name: The Ultimate Tech Quiz
description: A blog that presents users with 5 new technical questions each day in subjects such as programming, cybersecurity, database architecture, and more. The second half then gives answers and explanations in regard to each. !

name: Game on
description: A blog that lists and provides links to games for Windows and macOS for users to compete against friends, family, or the computer through a series of increasingly challenging levels of strategy, trivia, word-games, riddles,and more.
